name: Dandy Day Bench Shagreen w/Bronze-Patina Brass
description: The Dandy Day Bench is the ultimate luxury seating piece. Available in a variety finishes.Currently made to order 8-10 weeksDesign SKU reference KLOV01· Handmade· Shagreen surface, bronze-patina brass legs· 140 x 40 x 50 cm· Wipe clean with soft dry cloth· Made in PhilippinesAlthough inspired by her parents, her collection of Home Accessories and Furniture is a distinct identity of its own. Kifu uses handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, materials she experienced as a child growing up in her parent's studio, but interpreted in a younger quirkier way reflecting her youth.
